mim.author: ETXJOTJ
mim.name: RcsUser
mim.description: Model for RBS User identification and maintenance users. Maintentance users can login without LDAP authentication and are automatically assigned the EricssonSupport role.

structMember.name: cleartext
structMember.description: Indicates whether or not the password is entered in cleartext.

structMember.name: password
structMember.description: Holds the password or passphrase text.

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: Represents a leaf that has no value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

class.name: UserIdentity
class.description:
The UserIdentity class provides means for giving the true user name.
This class is used for recording the true user name, in case a generic user name has been used at login. This typically happens when the operator access the ME through a MS, and the user's credentials are only checked when logging in to the MS.
This class also provides a mechanism for shutting down all other sessions than maintenance user sessions.

attribute.name: userIdentityId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: userName
attribute.description: The user name associated to the operator actually providing input to the management system. Note! This attribute may be set, but because the value is session dependent it will not be shown to the user.

class.name: MaintenanceUser
class.description:
This class provides means for offline authentication.
A maintenance user can login without LDAP authentication and is assigned a role through which the entire model can be accessed. Only maintenance users can add MaintenanceUser MOs. In order to do so there may not be any normal users logged in. The closeSession action of the MaintenanceUserSecurity MOC can be used to close any other open sessions.

attribute.name: maintenanceUserId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: subjectName
attribute.description: This value shall be the subject name of the certificate used for logging in. If no subject name is configured, certificate based login will not be available for this user.

attribute.name: userName
attribute.description: Optional user name for SSH-based login.

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: Password used for SSH based login. If no password is given, SSH based login will not be available for this maintenance user. The password must be at least 12 characters long and contain at least three lower cases, three upper cases, two numeric cases and one special case. At Auto Integration no check of the password strength will be done.

class.name: MaintenanceUserSecurity
class.description: This MO provides an action for shutting down all other sessions than maintenance user sessions. This is necessary in order to configure attributes in this MO as well as adding or removing MaintenanceUser MOs.

action.name: closeSessions
action.description: This action will close all sessions except for maintenance user sessions.

attribute.name: maintenanceUserSecurityId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.
